title: Demonic crawler

|   |                                                                                                                                            |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A hellish insectoid creature with a long and bloated body, supported by dozens of short jointed legs and topped with an almost human head. |

## Useful Info

**Demonic crawlers** are grotesque [demonic](/Demon "Demon") pests. In addition to fast speed and moderately high damage, demonic crawlers regenerate *very* quickly, gaining +6 HP/turn. They are often encountered in the [Spider's Nest](/Spider%27s_Nest "Spider's Nest").

## Tips & Tricks

- High damage is usually required to kill them. Barring that, the following work well:

  - Hex [wands](/Wand "Wand"). They have moderate [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower"), but a [scroll of vulnerability](/Scroll_of_vulnerability "Scroll of vulnerability") can lower it. [Paralysis](/Wand_of_paralysis "Wand of paralysis") gives [stab](/Stab "Stab") bonuses, which usually lets melee fighters kill it in time. [Charming](/Wand_of_charming "Wand of charming") can allow other spiders to do the work for you. [Polymorph](/Wand_of_polymorph "Wand of polymorph") will turn it into a form without regeneration.
  - [Clouds](/Cloud "Cloud"). A [condenser vane](/Condenser_vane "Condenser vane"), if it doesn't create poisonous clouds, will let you outdamage their regeneration. [Freezing Cloud](/Freezing_Cloud "Freezing Cloud") will work just as well.
  - [Scroll of immolation](/Scroll_of_immolation "Scroll of immolation") or [Inner Flame](/Inner_Flame "Inner Flame"). A couple of spiders exploding can do the trick. In a pinch, immolation can even work against a lone crawler, since Inner Flame creates a flame cloud on hit. Just make sure the explosions don't kill you.

- Unlike many other opponents in the Spider's Nest, demonic crawlers are resistant to [poison](/Poison "Poison"), but they are vulnerable to weapons of [holy wrath](/Holy_wrath "Holy wrath") and other holy effects.

## History

- Prior to [0.30](/0.30 "0.30"), demonic crawlers didn't have fast regeneration, but had many resistances (rF+ rC+ rElec rMiasma, and 100 will) and the [Warning Cry](/Warning_Cry "Warning Cry") ability.
- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), demonic crawlers were Big-sized, did less damage, and did not have Warning Cry.
- Prior to [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), demonic crawlers could [cling](/Cling "Cling") to walls.
html:
Demonic crawler

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.30: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all arthropods, see list of arthropods.

demonic crawler s 
HP 38-78
HD 9
XP 351
Speed 13
AC 10
EV 6
Will 60
Attack1 20 (hit: plain)
Attack2 20 (hit: plain)
Attack3 20 (hit: plain)
Resistances rPois+
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Animal
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Demonic
Size Large
Type demonic crawler, demonic crawler
Flags Regenerates
See invisible
No skeleton
Web immune
A hellish insectoid creature with a long and bloated body, supported by dozens of short jointed legs and topped with an almost human head.

Useful Info

Demonic crawlers are grotesque demonic pests. In addition to fast speed and moderately high damage, demonic crawlers regenerate very quickly, gaining +6 HP/turn. They are often encountered in the Spider's Nest.

Tips & Tricks

  • High damage is usually required to kill them. Barring that, the following work well:
    • Hex wands. They have moderate willpower, but a scroll of vulnerability can lower it. Paralysis gives stab bonuses, which usually lets melee fighters kill it in time. Charming can allow other spiders to do the work for you. Polymorph will turn it into a form without regeneration.
    • Clouds. A condenser vane, if it doesn't create poisonous clouds, will let you outdamage their regeneration. Freezing Cloud will work just as well.
    • Scroll of immolation or Inner Flame. A couple of spiders exploding can do the trick. In a pinch, immolation can even work against a lone crawler, since Inner Flame creates a flame cloud on hit. Just make sure the explosions don't kill you.
  • Unlike many other opponents in the Spider's Nest, demonic crawlers are resistant to poison, but they are vulnerable to weapons of holy wrath and other holy effects.

History

  • Prior to 0.30, demonic crawlers didn't have fast regeneration, but had many resistances (rF+ rC+ rElec rMiasma, and 100 will) and the Warning Cry ability.
  • Prior to 0.28, demonic crawlers were Big-sized, did less damage, and did not have Warning Cry.
  • Prior to 0.25, demonic crawlers could cling to walls.
Retrieved from "http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Demonic_crawler&oldid=73542"

{{version030}}
{{list of | arthropods}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Demonic crawlers''' are grotesque [[demon]]ic pests. In addition to fast speed and moderately high damage, demonic crawlers regenerate ''very'' quickly, gaining +6 HP/turn. They are often encountered in the [[Spider's Nest]].

==Tips & Tricks==
*High damage is usually required to kill them. Barring that, the following work well:
**Hex [[wand]]s. They have moderate [[willpower]], but a [[scroll of vulnerability]] can lower it. [[Wand of paralysis|Paralysis]] gives [[stab]] bonuses, which usually lets melee fighters kill it in time. [[Wand of charming|Charming]] can allow other spiders to do the work for you. [[Wand of polymorph|Polymorph]] will turn it into a form without regeneration. 
**[[Cloud]]s. A [[condenser vane]], if it doesn't create poisonous clouds, will let you outdamage their regeneration. [[Freezing Cloud]] will work just as well.
**[[Scroll of immolation]] or [[Inner Flame]]. A couple of spiders exploding can do the trick. In a pinch, immolation can even work against a lone crawler, since Inner Flame creates a flame cloud on hit. Just make sure the explosions don't kill you.
*Unlike many other opponents in the Spider's Nest, demonic crawlers are resistant to [[poison]], but they are vulnerable to weapons of [[holy wrath]] and other holy effects.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.30]], demonic crawlers didn't have fast regeneration, but had many resistances (rF+ rC+ rElec rMiasma, and 100 will) and the [[Warning Cry]] ability.
*Prior to [[0.28]], demonic crawlers were Big-sized, did less damage, and did not have Warning Cry.
*Prior to [[0.25]], demonic crawlers could [[cling]] to walls.

[[Category:Demon]]
